meanings.definition: A vehicle used for collecting and transporting waste or garbage.
meanings.sent1: The dustcarts arrived early in the morning to pick up the trash.
meanings.sent2: The city council purchased new dustcarts to improve waste collection efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The dustcarts in the neighborhood always seem to have a mind of their own, zigzagging down the streets.
meanings.sent4: The dustcarts lined up in a row, ready to devour the piles of garbage like hungry beasts.
meanings.sent5: The loud rumble of the dustcarts echoed through the empty streets, signaling the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: The act of using a dustcart to remove trash from a location.
meanings.sent1: The dustcarts made quick work of clearing out the debris after the storm.
meanings.sent2: After the event, the dustcarts were called in to clean up the venue.
meanings.sent3: It was a comical sight to see the dustcarts racing against time to clear the area before the big parade.
meanings.sent4: The dustcarts swooped in like heroes, saving the day by swiftly removing the unwanted mess.
meanings.sent5: The dustcarts hummed with purpose as they diligently carried out their task of tidying up the streets.
